sentences.en: An icy sleet was beginning to fall.
sentences.cn: 天开始下起了冰冷的冻雨.

sentences.en: Conditions were damp and foggy after morning sleet.
sentences.cn: 早上的雨夹雪过后天气潮湿多雾。

sentences.en: Driving sleet brought more problems to roads last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚的雨夹雪给道路带来了更多的问题.

sentences.en: From the atmosphere, water molecules fall upon the Earth's surface as rain, snow, hail and sleet.
sentences.cn: 水分子以雨 、 雪 、 雹和霰的形式从大气圈降落到地表.

sentences.en: He destroyed their vines with hail and their sycamore - figs with sleet.
sentences.cn: 47他降冰雹打坏他们的葡萄树.下严霜打坏他们的桑树.

sentences.en: He destroyed their vines with hail and their sycamore figs with sleet.
sentences.cn: 他降冰雹打坏他们的葡萄树.下严霜打坏他们的桑树.

sentences.en: In tail of the thunders fell pouring storms of sleet and hail.
sentences.cn: 雷声之后紧接着是是倾盆大雨加冰雹.

sentences.en: In the drive of the wind and sleet they pushed in on one another.
sentences.cn: 风雪交加之下,他们相互挤在一起.

sentences.en: It is sleeting , ie Sleet is falling.
It was raining and the rain soon turned to sleet, but he still sat there.
sentences.cn: 下雨了,不久雨雪交加, 他还是照旧坐在那儿.

sentences.en: Much of the Deep South is still getting snow , sleet, and rain.
sentences.cn: 许多南部地区仍然遭受着大雪, 冰雨和大雨中.

sentences.en: Northern Kentucky is likely to get snow mixed with sleet.
sentences.cn: 肯塔基州北部可能有雨夹雪。

sentences.en: Photo Tip: When shooting in cold weather, or extreme conditions such as snow and sleet, it's important not to change your lenses outdoors.
sentences.cn: 拍照小技巧：在寒冷的天气里，或者遇到极端天气的时候，如下雪或者雨夹雪，想要拍照，最重要的是注意不要在户外更换镜头。

sentences.en: The sleet stuck to the branches of trees and reflected the light from the street lamps.
sentences.cn: 冻雨凝结在树枝上,反射着街灯发出的光.

sentences.en: The three boys threw their hockey gear to the top of the hill and tried crawling up the path, but the sleet had created a smooth glacier with nothing to hold on to.
sentences.cn: 三个男孩儿把他们的冰球装备扔到山顶上，然后试着沿小路往上爬，但雨夹雪已经令山坡变得更加的滑，而且没有任何可以抓住的东西。

sentences.en: The wind began to build and the sleet to blow about.
sentences.cn: 风开始大起来了,雨雪四处飞扬.

sentences.en: We heard the tick - tack of sleet on frosted windowpanes.
sentences.cn: 我们听到雨夹雪打在冰冻的玻璃上的滴滴答答的声音.

trans.tran_en: half-frozen rain that falls when it is very cold
